item.title: U.S. arrests suspect in 2012 Benghazi consulate attack, Bondi says
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi said Zubayar al-Bakoush has been extradited to the United States and will face murder, arson and terrorism related charges.

item.title: Japan’s Takaichi eyes decisive mandate as polls point to snap election landslide
item.description: The poll showed that the LDP-led coalition was likely to secure more than 300 of the 465 seats in the Lower House.
